dict.acceptation: 打扫，清理；扫除；彻底搜索；掠过；
打扫；扫过；蜿蜒；大范围伸展；

sent.orig: He would sweep these rascals as the wind sweep leaves.
sent.trans: 他准会象风卷残叶似的把这帮匪徒一扫而光。

sent.orig: The measuring principle of frequency sweep meter is based upon frequency-sweep measuring method.
sent.trans: 扫频测量法是目前较为先进的一种测量方法。

sent.orig: Sweep frequency signal generator has automatic sweep frequency, remote control, controller and etc.
sent.trans: 扫频信号发生器有自动扫频、手控、程控和远控等工作方式。

sent.orig: Sweep the crumbs off the table; Sweep under the bed.
sent.trans: 打扫桌子上的面包屑；打扫床底下。

sent.orig: Just as we sweep our rooms. so we should sweep backward ideas from our minds.
sent.trans: 正如打扫房屋一样。我们也要扫除我们头脑中落后的东西。
